main.name: Amit Kumar Sahu
main.description: I am a Software Engineer and I use C# to develop desktop applications, Python Flask frame work and JAVA Spring boot for making rest APIS and little bit of front-end using React.
main.bio: Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Backend technologies like  Java, Spring Framework, and Python Flask framework, also worked in the front end with React and Next.js. Worked on other necessary tools like Powershell, C#, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), and MySQL, PostGreSQL. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor of Technology - BTech focused in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Biju Patnaik University of Technology, Odisha.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked on Full stack profile, mostly creating Rest APIs as per the requirements using JAVA Spring boot, and Python Flask framework, also some work in React front end. Accessing requirements and creating new APIs and resolving existing issues.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description: Worked on Multiple MFA products based on WPF and winform and implemented useful features, resolved issues in production. Wrote Powershell scripts as product add ons as per client requirements.
